net.proteusframework.core.notification

Class Notifications

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifications

  • public final class Notifications
extends java.lang.Object
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that operate on or return notifications.
    Author:
    russ (russ@proteus.co)
